headline: New York Islanders, Oak View Group want virus-killing air systems in new UBS Arena
summary: The arena development firm said it's spending $2 million on technology that will clean air in the UBS Arena opens, which opens in November 2021.

headline: Four charts can explain the small-cap surge and signal what investors should do
summary: Small caps are rallying, but the charts suggest investors should sell the bounce, trader Mark Newton told CNBC.

headline: Gilead CEO: 'We have ample supply' of remdesivir for hospitalized coronavirus patients
summary: Gilead will have enough global supply of its coronavirus treatment remdesivir by the end of October, CEO Daniel O'Day told CNBC on Friday.
IBM is going all-in on the cloud, and John Petrides of Tocqueville Asset Management said it's about to undergo a Microsoft-type transformation.
headline: One of the cheapest tech stocks is going through a transformative period, market analyst says
5 things to know before the stock market opens Friday
summary: Dow futures advanced Friday as investors sought clarity around whether another round of coronavirus stimulus was still possible.
The number of mortgages in active pandemic-related bailouts plunged as the first wave of forbearance plans hit the end of their six-month term.
headline: Coronavirus mortgage bailouts fall below 3 million in pandemic's sharpest decline
Traders are confused by the stimulus back-and-forth and have their doubts about the market gains
summary: "The action over the last couple weeks is baking a lot of positive news into the market," Jack Miller, head of trading at Baird, said.

headline: A shortage of teachers and Covid-19 create a perfect storm for the education system
summary: The Covid-19 crisis and an ongoing nationwide shortage of qualified teachers have created a perfect storm in the education world that may only worsen in the months to come.

headline: Trump’s Chance to Win is Fading With Little Time Left to Recover
summary: While the lesson of the 2016 campaign was never to count out Donald Trump, his path to re-election is narrowing dramatically as Democrat Joe Biden’s lead continues to grow and voters sour on the president’s handling of the coronavirus pandemic.

headline: Jay Z-backed Devialet launches $300 AirPods Pro rival in Europe
summary: France's Devialet has debuted a pair of wireless earbuds called Gemini, its first new product in two years.
The  London Stock Exchange confirmed it had entered exclusive discussions with Euronext in relation to the sale of the Borsa Italiana group last month.
headline: LSE to sell Borsa Italiana stock exchange to Euronext for $5 billion
Green Bay on 'verge of a crisis' as virus overwhelms hospitals, Wisconsin doctor says
summary: "We see a frighteningly rising trend of Covid positivity rate above 20% in our community," Bellin Hospital Emergency Department Medical Director Paul Casey told CNBC's Shepard Smith.
"The reality is it's just more expensive to operate, you know, in the coronavirus world that we're living in now," Domino's Pizza CEO Ritch Allison told CNBC's Jim Cramer.
headline: Short-term pandemic-related costs ate into Domino's profit line, CEO says

summary: "Regardless of who wins the election next month, it'll be bad news for the oil industry," the "Mad Money" host said.
headline: Jim Cramer on oil: 'My long-term forecast is grim' under a Trump or Biden administration
Jim Cramer reveals his top stocks in 7 under-the-radar bull markets
summary: "Main Street may indeed need a stimulus deal, but Wall Street can do just fine without one, and so can your portfolio as long as you focus on the bull markets that don't need no stinking bailout," the "Mad Money" host said.
AMC chief executive Adam Aron pointed to the company's agreement with Universal Pictures as one reason to keep operating theaters during the pandemic.
headline: AMC CEO: Keeping movie theaters open is 'the right decision' even as rival Regal shutters screens
Pixar's 'Soul' ditches theaters, is heading to Disney+ for Christmas
summary: Disney's "Soul" is skipping theaters and heading to Disney+ in time for Christmas.
J.P. Morgan Securities' Colleen O'Callaghan is taking steps to protect portfolios from an economic setback.
headline: Top J.P. Morgan advisor increases cash position, cites stimulus gridlock risks as major reason

summary: U.S. stock futures rose on Thursday night as Wall Street continued to search for clarity surrounding a new potential fiscal aid bill.
headline: Stock futures rise as traders await for clues on new fiscal stimulus

summary: The moves complete Morgan Stanley’s shift from being a firm dominated by traders and investment bankers to one where money management rules.
headline: With $20 billion in deals this year, Morgan Stanley pivots further away from risky Wall Street
